name: Dragon Selection One
overview: Dragon Selection One is a collection of four simplistic games that see you take on your Dragon. * Brain Ache is a mastermind style puzzle game that sees you trying to crack the two character combination before you run out of moves. * Horse Race allows up to 8 players to gamble on the virtual track. * Row of Four pits you against the Dragon in a game of connect 4 * Simon sees you trying to match the colour combinations provided by the Dragon which get harder and harder the more you get right!
